Class CalendarImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
CalendarImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CalendarInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class CalendarImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements CalendarInterface
This class represents the implementation of the CalendarInterface. It allows remote clients to perform various operations on a calendar of events.
See Also:
